HERO_CONTENT: Hi, I'm a passionate developer specializing in the MERN stack, Next.js, and WordPress. With a solid understanding of front-end and back-end technologies, I create dynamic web applications and user-friendly websites that deliver exceptional experiences and drive business growth.
ABOUT_TEXT: I am a passionate MERN stack developer dedicated to crafting efficient, user-centric web applications. My expertise spans ReactJS, Node.js, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Next.js, and WordPress, fueling my love for problem-solving and continuous learning. I thrive in collaborative settings and actively contribute to open-source projects. Beyond coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, staying active, and connecting with fellow tech enthusiasts. Letâ€™s discuss front-end development, potential collaborations, or even share favorite films or recipes! Reach out at rittikchauhan8112002@gmail.com.

PROJECTS.title: REACT PORTFOLIO WEBSITE
PROJECTS.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.

PROJECTS.title: REACT PASSWORD GENERATOR APP
PROJECTS.description: An application for generating passwords including numbers, symbols, uppercase and lowercase letters.

PROJECTS.title: REACT WEATHER APP
PROJECTS.description: My first React project. A simple project using an API to fetch weather data.

PROJECTS.title: MERN BLOG WEBSITE
PROJECTS.description: A MERN blog website with login, register, and logout functionality. Includes a dashboard for admins to create projects, although the dashboard functionality is not fully working after deployment but functions well on localhost.

PROJECTS.title: REACT YOUTUBE CLONE
PROJECTS.description: My first clone project - a semi-functional, responsive YouTube clone application.

PROJECTS.title: MERN GYM WEBSITE
PROJECTS.description: Welcome to our innovative gym website, crafted with the MERN stack and styled using Tailwind CSS, where fitness meets functionality. Our platform features a user-friendly BMI calculator to help you monitor your health metrics and achieve your fitness goals. With the ability to add personalized diet plans, you can easily manage your nutrition and fuel your workouts effectively. The Contact Us section provides a seamless way to reach out for support, ensuring all your queries are addressed promptly. Additionally, our secure login and registration system allows users to access their personal profiles effortlessly, enhancing their overall experience. Join us today and embark on your journey to a healthier, fitter lifestyle!

PROJECTS.title: NEXTJS PORTFOLIO
PROJECTS.description: Explore my Next.js portfolio, featuring a seamless Hire Me button that redirects to WhatsApp and a Donwload CV button for easy access to my resume. All social media links are fully functional, and my dynamic projects showcase my skills and creativity in web development.
